rules.description: [special] Lower left key to Taking screenshot and copy to clipboard.

to.shell_command: MY_SCREENCAPTURE_FILE=$HOME/Pictures/Capture/Screenshot_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S').png; screencapture -i -C $MY_SCREENCAPTURE_FILE && osascript -e "set the clipboard to (read (POSIX file \"$MY_SCREENCAPTURE_FILE\") as JPEG picture)"

MY_SCREENCAPTURE_FILE=$HOME/Pictures/Capture/Screenshot_$(date +'%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S').png; screencapture -C $MY_SCREENCAPTURE_FILE && osascript -e "set the clipboard to (read (POSIX file \"$MY_SCREENCAPTURE_FILE\") as JPEG picture)"
